segments.text: Hi , Debbie . Have a seat . How's it going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm OK . How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty good . Listen ... have you heard about the new Thai restaurant over on University Avenue ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the one . A bunch of us are going there for dinner tomorrow night.How about coming with us ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great . I'll call and make reservations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Any time after 6 o'clock is good for me.Oh ! I'm late ! I have a class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . I'll call you tonight and tell you the time .
segments.speaker: S2
